item.title: Officials Vow Strict Action Against Sex Determination: PCPNDT Act Reviewed in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A District Advisory Committee meeting on the Pre-Conception and Pre-Natal Diagnostic Techniques (PCPNDT) Act, 1994, was held at the District Medical and Health Department Office in Jogulamba Gadwal under the chairmanship of Dr. S.K. Siddappa, District Medical and Health Officer (DMHO). The meeting focused on reviewing the implementation of the PCPNDT Act and ensuring strict compliance across all departments.
Addressing the gathering, Dr. Siddappa emphasized the urgent need to spread awa...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Record Paddy Procurement in Gadwal: District Collector Inspects Gurram Gadda Dweep Center, Ensures Prompt Payments to Farmers
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: On Wednesday, the Collector visited the paddy procurement center operated under the IKP (Indira Kranthi Patham) at Gurram Gadda Dweep village in Gadwal Mandal. During the inspection, he personally examined the paddy that farmers had dried at the procurement site.
He instructed officials that paddy with up to 17% moisture should be weighed and procured at Minimum Support Price (MSP) and immediately transported to rice mills. The Collector emphasized the need to speed up the movement of p...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
